channel.title: Moments Podcast
channel.description: A place for you to feel understood, a place for you to know you’re never alone, a place to escape. This podcast dives deep into all of our wild thoughts and unexplainable emotions. I want this podcast to make you feel good, feel inspired and feel okay with being exactly where you are here and now. We all know the only moment that exists is now, so let’s enjoy it. And let’s talk mental health- and of course everything in-between. Welcome to The Moments Podcast: with Lexi Hidalgo
channel.itunes:summary: A place for you to feel understood, a place for you to know you’re never alone, a place to escape. This podcast dives deep into all of our wild thoughts and unexplainable emotions. I want this podcast to make you feel good, feel inspired and feel okay with being exactly where you are here and now. We all know the only moment that exists is now, so let’s enjoy it. And let’s talk mental health- and of course everything in-between. Welcome to The Moments Podcast: with Lexi Hidalgo
channel.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 54: Moments of advice (part 2)
item.itunes:title: Moments of advice (part 2)
item.description: Everything you might need to hear, confidence, self love, opinions of others, and everything in between.
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 53: Moments of advice
item.itunes:title: Moments of advice
item.description: All the things you wanted some advice on, friends, boys, dreams and some other things in-between (Part two out next Monday)
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 52: Moments out of your comfort zone
item.itunes:title: Moments out of your comfort zone
item.description: A random little episode I recorded after I did something huge for myself, I want to explain to you why it’s so important to step out of your comfort zone and make fear your bestfriend.
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 51: Moments about self worth
item.itunes:title: Moments about self worth
item.description: You can choose to make a good impact in the world, or a negative one- and that’s something up to you. Talking about understanding your self worth, knowing your impact and everything in between in this weeks episode:)
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 50: Moments about road-trips
item.itunes:title: Moments about road-trips
item.description: While the written itinerary is in the works, here’s the beautiful lessons I’ve learned along road trips and why I believe they’re so special- and my little run down on how I do my planning :)
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 49: Moments about college
item.itunes:title: Moments about college
item.description: Two gals, two different college experiences and advice on it all- here’s me and Lissette talking all about college
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 48: Moments after therapy
item.itunes:title: Moments after therapy
item.description: Teaching you all the valuable lessons my therapist has taught me. The simplest things have changed my life & I really do believe they’ll change yours too
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 47: Moments navigating your early 20’s
item.itunes:title: Moments navigating your early 20’s
item.description: A little piece I wrote about what life may feel like in your early 20’s. It’s not the easiest time, but it’s definitely memorable and we are gonna make the absolute best of it- it’s a beautiful time of of our lives. Let’s talk about the ups and downs together:)
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 46: Moments in lessons
item.itunes:title: Moments in lessons
item.description: I’ve learned a lot this week, everything from appreciating being young to understanding that sometimes you’re wrong. I think we could all gain from learning a little something new and I wanted to share these lessons with you.
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 45: Moments faking it till you make it
item.itunes:title: Moments faking it till you make it
item.description: Sometimes we’re under the wave longer than we’d like to be, I definitely have been. For a few weeks now I’ve been struggling to remember what it feels like to enjoy all of the beauty in life’s little moments. We’re healing together & I want to talk about it some more. The key is shifting the mindset & faking it till you make it - and soon you feel healed and grateful.
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 44: Moments under the wave
item.itunes:title: Moments under the wave
item.description: The dreaded cycle of mental health, sometimes you have it all together and the next everything is falling apart. In this episode come with me to figure out how to get my mind back at a healthy place & how to do the same for yours
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 43: Moments in advice with Lissette
item.itunes:title: Moments in advice with Lissette
item.description: Incase you needed to hear it, here’s me and Lissette talking about a few of the things you all needed advice on- get excited- MOMENTS MERCH 8/20/22
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 42: Moments struggling with body image
item.itunes:title: Moments struggling with body image
item.description: Even in the midst of a perfect summer, we can all struggle with how we feel, what we look like and so many other things that shouldn’t be relevant- let’s talk about it together bc we all should loving ourselves a little more
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 41: Moments with Mere & Ana
item.itunes:title: Moments with Mere & Ana
item.description: My favorite people ever- just met, this is epic. Let’s talk about life- at midnight, while we’re delusional
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 40: Moments in my happy place
item.itunes:title: Moments in my happy place
item.description: My story of Costa Rica, my story of yoga, and the story of how I found myself. & all of the lessons I learned along the way.
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 39: Moments letting go of fear
item.itunes:title: Moments letting go of fear
item.description:
We’re all just doing our best to get through life, 
We should be LIVING life 
Life is a beautiful opportunity to discover yourself, discover your passions and understand your hardships & how they actually are helping you grow 

The moments podcast was created by me to help you understand you & your mental health. We’re all healing- let’s make it a good thing and evolve together
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 38: Moments with FOMO
item.itunes:title: Moments with FOMO
item.description: The fear of missing out, and how to avoid it. No one wants to feel sad, or left out, or lonely- so let’s talk about it
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 37: Moments with mere (Part 3)
item.itunes:title: Moments with mere (Part 3)
item.description: Your favorite pod guest is back, except this time we’re driving to the airport and I’m not sure either of us completed a full thought, but I’m sure there’s some takeaways- p.s. Michigan is awesome
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 36: Moments in awareness
item.itunes:title: Moments in awareness
item.description: Becoming aware of what you’re feeling, and why you’re feeling is going to bring you a lot more comfort than you realize. Tap into your awareness.
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 35: Moments about boys
item.itunes:title: Moments about boys
item.description: Just my hot takes while I was in my bad b!tch mindset, just wanted to answer some of your favorite questions about boys. Will definitely be doing a new variation of this episode when I’m in a different headspace.
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 34: Moments changing your perspective
item.itunes:title: Moments changing your perspective
item.description: The way you view your life can change based on your perspective. It’s the most powerful life tio I’ve ever learned & I’d like to share it with you.
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 33: Moments with a stomach bug
item.itunes:title: Moments with a stomach bug
item.description: Just talking and ranting for a few bc I was sick and lonely :) love you
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 32: Moments being selfish in your 20s
item.itunes:title: Moments being selfish in your 20s
item.description: Your 20’s are for you and only you. Watch your energy, check your surroundings and make sure you’re doing what makes you happy.
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 31: Moments telling you what you need to hear
item.itunes:title: Moments telling you what you need to hear
item.description: Just tune in, you might need to hear this
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 30: Moments in Exploration
item.itunes:title: Moments in Exploration
item.description: A new chapter, a beautiful place to be exploring- favorite episode I’ve recorded in a while :)
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 29: Moments On My Mind
item.itunes:title: Moments On My Mind
item.description: A quick little episode because my brain is clustered- which is ok- love you.
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 28: Moments trying your best
item.itunes:title: Moments trying your best
item.description: We’re all just taking it one day at a time, give it what you can & remember to give yourself grace. You’re just human.
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 27: Moments Chasing Stability
item.itunes:title: Moments Chasing Stability
item.description: We’re always working towards what we don’t have, and I think it’s time for us all to focus on the more important things. Like the simple ones, love, laughter and finding contentment in the current moment.
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 26: In This Moment w/ Mere
item.itunes:title: In This Moment w/ Mere
item.description: Your favorite podcast guest is back and better than ever. Here’s what’s on Mere and I’s mind & the answers to a few questions you asked :)
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 25: Moments in Growing Up
item.itunes:title: Moments in Growing Up
item.description: Here’s a few of the many lessons I’ve learned, it’s a process and we’re all going through the motions.
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 24: Moments with Ana
item.itunes:title: Moments with Ana
item.description: Sometimes feel people like sunshine and laughter, Ana does, so we chatted & want you to listen
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 23: Moments in People Pleasing
item.itunes:title: Moments in People Pleasing
item.description: A new realization I’ve had about myself & how I’m processing it all.
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 22: Moments in Advice (#2)
item.itunes:title: Moments in Advice (#2)
item.description: Some more words of wisdom I was needing & maybe you are too.
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 21: Moments in Advice
item.itunes:title: Moments in Advice
item.description: Sometimes we all just need a few words of wisdom.
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 20: Moments in Feeling
item.itunes:title: Moments in Feeling
item.description: Life is a wave, but there’s a lot of beauty embracing the lows instead of avoiding them.
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 19: Moments in Staying Motivated
item.itunes:title: Moments in Staying Motivated
item.description: It started out about motivated but ended up being about balance & acceptance- enjoy :)
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 18: Moments in Self Love
item.itunes:title: Moments in Self Love
item.description:
Happy Valentine’s Day, to yourself :) 
Give yourself extra lovin today.
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 17: Moments in Realizing Healing Isn't Linear
item.itunes:title: Moments in Realizing Healing Isn't Linear
item.description: Just trust the journey, let’s discuss
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 16: Moments Learning to Love Your Body
item.itunes:title: Moments Learning to Love Your Body
item.description: This episode is all over the place but let’s talk more about why we all should start loving ourselves a bit more.
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 15: Moments in Finding Simplicity
item.itunes:title: Moments in Finding Simplicity
item.description: Life doesn’t have to be so heavy, enjoy the little things. Sending you love from Hawaii.
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 14: Moments with Mere
item.itunes:title: Moments with Mere
item.description: Meet one of my favorite people in the whole world & listening to this you’ll quickly understand why.
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 13: Moments Healing Somewhere That Hurt You
item.itunes:title: Moments Healing Somewhere That Hurt You
item.description: One of the last episodes before I go back out to Hawaii. Here's where I’m at & here’s how we’re healing.
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 12: Moments in New Years Resolutions
item.itunes:title: Moments in New Years Resolutions
item.description: In today's episode we are reflecting on 2021 and what is to come in 2022. 2021, you taught me more than I could’ve imagined, cheers to making 2022 our year!
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 11: Moments in 2021 Takeaways
item.itunes:title: Moments in 2021 Takeaways
item.description: This year has definitely been a year of learning, good & bad things but mostly beautiful lessons. Just wanted to share them with you. Let’s make 2022 a good one!
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 10: Moments in Advice
item.itunes:title: Moments in Advice
item.description: Every 10 episodes we are going to talk about exactly what you want to hear! So here is some "advice" on things you guys were struggling with <3
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 9: Moments Learning to Change
item.itunes:title: Moments Learning to Change
item.description:
Change is a beautiful thing, I believe we should all do our best to appreciate it more.
Reminding you to hug your friends and family this week.
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 8: Moments in Gratitude
item.itunes:title: Moments in Gratitude
item.description: In today's episode, we touch on gratitude. Sometimes the little changes we make, can change a lot. Not just for you, but the people around you. Appreciate yourself & all the simple beauty surrounding you.
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 7: Moments in Friendship
item.itunes:title: Moments in Friendship
item.description: This episode Lissette and I talk a little bit about our friendship and how we’ve stayed inseparable for 14 years. We dive deeper into what it’s like to have a true friend.
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 6: Moments in the Happening
item.itunes:title: Moments in the Happening
item.description: Finally decided to sit down and tell you about the time my dream got crushed, then it got rebuilt… meet Mater, my new van :)
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 5: Moments in Anxiety
item.itunes:title: Moments in Anxiety
item.description: In this episode I wanted to dive deeper into my struggle with anxiety, the things that make me anxious and the the things I do to help it pass. If you’re struggling, I believe in you & I love you.
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 4: Moments in my Notes App
item.itunes:title: Moments in my Notes App
item.description: My notes app is like my diary.. there’s a lot of good, bad & ugly in here & I think we should talk about it all. Just want to share some of my growth & advice with you guys :)
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 3: Moments Asking My Mom What You’re Scared to Ask Yours
item.itunes:title: Moments Asking My Mom What You’re Scared to Ask Yours
item.description: Hey beautiful people, I won’t lie I was super nervous to record this. But I’m so glad I did, I think my mom and I both learned a lot from each other. So here’s the moment we asked my mom all the scary questions we’ve always wanted answers to.
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 2: Moments in Rediscovering Yourself
item.itunes:title: Moments in Rediscovering Yourself
item.description: In todays episode let’s talk about what it really feels like to lose yourself & how to get back in touch with what you’ve lost. You deserve to feel good, and I know you’re capable of it. I love you & I hope you’re smiling.
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo

item.title: 1: Moments in New Beginnings
item.itunes:title: Moments in New Beginnings
item.description: WELCOME TO THE FIRST EPISODE BEAUTIFUL PEOPLE. I can’t process that this is happening. I wanted to use this opportunity to talk you a little more about me & who I am. This is going to be such a fun journey and I can’t wait to see where life takes us
item.itunes:author: Lexi Hidalgo
item.dc:creator: Lexi Hidalgo
